property.caption: Swipe element selector
property.description: Class/ID that will be used to add the mobile gesture to. For instance ".mx-layoutcontainer-middle". This selector is a CSS selector, so you can use a '.className' and '#ID' if you want

property.caption: Parent
property.description: If parent is set to yes, it will search for the swipe element as a parent, relative to the widget.

property.caption: Timeout
property.description: Timeout to set the events. This might be necessary when you add this to pages where the element is not rendered yet. Usually you can leave this to 0

property.caption: Swipe Right Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when swiping right

property.caption: Swipe Left Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when swiping left

property.caption: Swipe Top Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when swiping up

property.caption: Swipe Bottom Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when swiping down

property.caption: Press Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when press and hold.

property.caption: Double Tap Microflow
property.description: The microflows to execute when double tap.
